tool_description:
Keep in Touch With Your Customers
With the Byteplant Phone Number Validation API you can easily verify if any national or international phone number is valid and callable. Avoid disconnects and increase the performance of your marketing campaigns now!
name: Byteplant Phone Number Online Validation
title: Byteplant Phone Number Online Validation

api_list.name: Byteplant Phone Number Validation

required_parameters.name: CountryCode
required_parameters.description: two letter ISO 3166-1 country code (string); default 'US'

required_parameters.name: Locale
required_parameters.description: IETF language tag for Geocoding (string); default 'en-US'
